column1: in memory of jaran espanol -- green valley mortuary| jaran espanol. february 11
column3: 2015. biography. jaran was 25 y/o with a passion for art. he spent his days self employed as a tattoo artist using his skills to paint the perfect picture on his clients. jaran was surrounded by his big family and plentiful friends. he was the sweetest
column4: most loyal person anyone has ever met. those who were able to be a part of or witness his life are truly blessed.
